messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
http://code.google.com/p/go/

https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/5001/doc/contrib.html File doc/contrib.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/5001/doc/contrib.html#newcode95 doc/contrib.html:95:

A semi-automatically updated list of external Go programs and libraries, along with their documentation.

A list of Go packages and their documentation.

Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/11001/doc/articles/c_go_cgo.html File doc/articles/c_go_cgo.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/11001/doc/articles/c_go_cgo.html#newcode173 doc/articles/c_go_cgo.html:173: and godoc.org please revert this change, too https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/11001/doc/contrib.html File doc/contrib.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/9114043/diff/11001/doc/contrib.html#newcode94 doc/contrib.html:94:

godoc.org

please revert this particular change. i don't think it belongs here
